content:
I got an email saying

I am a student looking for books that treat basic subjects using a categorical framework. Would you know where one can find an electronic or physical copy of Lawvere's book Algebra Step by Step, which is listed on his website?
I had never even heard of this book! Is it available anywhere?

John Baez said:

I had never even heard of this book! Is it available anywhere?

It's mentioned on https://github.com/mattearnshaw/lawvere, but unfortunately there isn't a copy available there.
